akn:content.akn:p: A debtor or secondary obligor may waive the right to notification of disposition of collateral under ยง 28:9-611 only by an agreement to that effect entered into and authenticated after default.
A debtor may waive the right to require disposition of collateral under ยง 28:9-620(e) only by an agreement to that effect entered into and authenticated after default.

Except in a consumer-goods transaction, a debtor or secondary obligor may waive the right to redeem collateral under ยง 28:9-623 only by an agreement to that effect entered into and authenticated after default.
